alert.note: Alert for Dallas (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 01 at 7:23AM CST until March 01 at 8:15AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 815 AM CST. * At 722 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lancaster, moving east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Dallas, Grand Prairie, Mesquite, Desoto, Cedar Hill, Duncanville, Lancaster, Balch Springs, Seagoville, Glenn Heights, Hutchins, Cockrell Hill, Sunnyvale, Wilmer, Ovilla, Ferris, Combine, Cedar Hill State Park, Joe Pool Lake and Sand Branch. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35E between mile markers 412 and 425. Interstate 20 between mile markers 454 and 485. Interstate 45 between mile markers 267 and 282. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
